Teleporters._comment: Adding those entrance rule so logic doesn't try to reverse teleport until I find a mod to do it

The Stranger.requires: |SpaceSuit| and |Signaloscope| and |Signal > DeepSpace| and {OptOne(|Stranger Access|)} and |@DLC - Stranger Entrance:1|

DreamWorld General._comment: Contains locations that doesn't belong to any specific Dreamworld (like the river or just entering the dreamworld in general)

Shrouded Woodlands Archive.requires: (|DreamWorld Loading Glitch| and (|River Lowlands Flame| or (|Cinder Isles Flame| and |DreamWorld Door Candles|) or (|Hidden Gorge Flame| and (|DreamWorld Render Glitch| or |DreamWorld Grabbing Hands|)) )) or (|River Lowlands Flame| and |DreamWorld Fake Fireplace| and ((|Cinder Isles Flame| and |DreamWorld Door Candles|) or (|Hidden Gorge Flame| and (|DreamWorld Render Glitch| or |DreamWorld Grabbing Hands|))))

Starlit Cove Archive.requires: (|DreamWorld Door Candles| and |DreamWorld Death Glitch|) or (|DreamWorld Door Candles| and |DreamWorld Grabbing Hands| and |DreamWorld Hidden Hand|)

Endless Canyon Archive.requires: |DreamWorld Render Glitch| or (|DreamWorld Fake Wall| and |DreamWorld Grabbing Hands|)

All Archive.requires: ((|DreamWorld Loading Glitch| and (|River Lowlands Flame| or (|Cinder Isles Flame| and |DreamWorld Door Candles|) or (|Hidden Gorge Flame| and (|DreamWorld Render Glitch| or |DreamWorld Grabbing Hands|)) )) or (|River Lowlands Flame| and |DreamWorld Fake Fireplace| and ((|Cinder Isles Flame| and |DreamWorld Door Candles|) or (|Hidden Gorge Flame| and (|DreamWorld Render Glitch| or |DreamWorld Grabbing Hands|))))) and ((|DreamWorld Door Candles| and |DreamWorld Death Glitch|) or (|DreamWorld Door Candles| and |DreamWorld Grabbing Hands| and |DreamWorld Hidden Hand|)) and (|DreamWorld Render Glitch| or (|DreamWorld Fake Wall| and |DreamWorld Grabbing Hands|))

Subterranean Lake.requires: (|Submerged Structure Flame| or ((|DreamWorld Loading Glitch| and (|River Lowlands Flame| or (|Cinder Isles Flame| and |DreamWorld Door Candles|) or (|Hidden Gorge Flame| and (|DreamWorld Render Glitch| or |DreamWorld Grabbing Hands|)) ))) )
